channel.title: CVE Feed for tutao -- tutanota
channel.description: The latest CVEs for tutao -- tutanota

item.title: CVE-2023-46116|2024-10-08T14:14:03.776Z -- tutao -- tutanota
item.description: Tutanota (Tuta Mail) is an encrypted email provider. Tutanota allows users to open links in emails in external applications. Prior to version 3.118.12, it correctly blocks the `file:` URL scheme, which can be used by malicious actors to gain code execution on a victims computer, however fails to check other harmful schemes such as `ftp:`, `smb:`, etc. which can also be used. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability will enable an attacker to gain code execution on a victim's computer. Version 3.118.2 contains a patch for this issue.
